Jackson Eshbaugh is a computer science and French student at Lafayette College in Easton, PA. His work centers on machine learning interpretability, multilingual natural language processing, and programming languages. He is especially passionate about applying computer science across disciplinesâ€”connecting language, biology, and education through code.
